pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-859 Add subsystem, XRDDEV-858 register, XRDDEV-863 unregister client
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add subsystem

Register client
https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-858
Unregister client
https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-863

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -82,15 +82,15 @@
 
       <template v-slot:item.button="{ item }">
         <div class="button-wrap">
-          <v-btn
-            v-if="(item.type == 'client' ||item.type == 'owner') && showAddClient()"
-            small
-            outlined
-            rounded
-            color="primary"
-            class="xrd-small-button xrd-table-button"
+          <SmallButton
+            v-if="(item.type == 'client' ||item.type == 'owner') && showAddClient"
             @click="addSubsystem(item)"
-          >{{$t('action.addSubsystem')}}</v-btn>
+          >{{$t('action.addSubsystem')}}</SmallButton>
+
+          <SmallButton
+            v-if="(item.type == 'client'||item.type != 'owner' && item.status === 'SAVED') && showRegister"

nodes.bodyText: add typings. And while you're on to it add typings to all variables in the data-block :)

commit.message: XRDDEV-859 Update packages and resolve audit
XRDDEV-857 Add add client wizard pages
XRDDEV-857 Remove unused and commented code
XRDDEV-857 Clean up code from store
XRDDEV-857 Add shared styling for wizard pages
XRDDEV-857 Remove absolute style from app footer
XRDDEV-859 Import client interface from types
XRDDEV-857 Fixed a bug on add key dialog
XRDDEV-857 Update select client api calls
XRDDEV-857 Change the way clients are passed to the dialog
XRDDEV-859 Use the new owner value in clients list
XRDDEV-859 Add confirm dialog to register
XRDDEV-859 Fix unit test data again

nodes.bodyText:
There are a couple of changes to queryparameters in develop so I guess this change should be made:
is_not_local_client -> exclude_local
Also internal_search -queryparameter can be removed. Actually only true value would do filtering, false does nothing.
It feels a bit inconsistent that we have here 3 methods returning a promise and one of them having error handling but the two others do not. I wonder if we could come up a more consistent way?

nodes.bodyText: Perhaps refactor styles here so that they're consistent in using hierarchial style definitions. .view-wrap contains all the other class style definitions in this comment rows. Currently only info-block and action-block hierarchy is defined.
